Gracian Survivor:
Have you heard about Gracia? This continent, located at some distance from Aden, barren land and scarce nature... There's a live strong and courageous people.
Although now almost no one left... Seeds Appeared out of nowhere and the monsters changed everything. We fought with them under the command Ceterus, but was not able to give them a fitting rebuff... In the end the mainland fell into the clutches of demons.
However, some managed to survive and get to Aden. We asked for help, and the heads of all the clans made a promise to help us. With the support of our troops joined the Alliance under the command Ceterus and preparing for revenge. The other part of the soldiers remained in Aden and encourages its residents to help Gracia.
